name: Tag'n'Snack
description:
Tag'n'Snack is a top-down 2-player-game of tag in a retro 8-bit style. You either play the innocent child desperately craving sweets and snacks, all while running away from your parent. Or you ARE the poor parent, not wanting to lose your child to the early death of sugar overdoses, so you try to catch that little thing before the time runs out - Earn as many points as you can by keeping your child in your line of sight or by feasting on those tasty snacks! 

Tag'n'Snack is a multiplayer game, which is currently only playable in a closed network, or by opening the ports.
